name: Leanne Graham
review: Falling apart after 2 months of using. Won't spend this much again on this.

name: Ervin Howell
review: Great shoe, comfortable to wear. But kind of hard to put on.

review: Vey stylish and my go to shoe for any event.

review: Nice shoe. Expect more designs in future.

review: Super comfortable and easy to wear show. Will definitley buy next time.

review: The heel is significantly higher than the toe.
